subtitle: A Japanese starter: chicken is threaded onto skewers, marinated and grilled. Allow 3-4 skewers per person.

method.text: Lay chicken breasts between 2 sheets of cling film or greaseproof paper. Gently bash with a rolling pin until about 1.25cm thick.
Cut lengthways into 2 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm wide strips. Thread concertina style onto wooden skewers. Place in a shallow glass dish.

Mix together the sugar, garlic, ginger, soy sauce and sake or dry sherry in a jug. Pour over the chicken, turning the skewers to coat. Cover and marinate in the fridge for at least 1 days or, ideally, overnight.
Preheat grill to a medium heat.
Cook under the grill for 10-12 min, turning the skewers frequently and brushing with marinade. Serve hot or cold.

title: Chicken yakitori
